thread.section_title: Renaissance Paris Vendome Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect Hotel, Outstanding Staff, Great Location!
thread.title_full: Perfect Hotel, Outstanding Staff, Great Location! - Review of Renaissance Paris Vendome Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: PermanentNomad
title: Perfect Hotel, Outstanding Staff, Great Location!
text: We simply love this hotel and have stayed here a few times in the last two years. The staff is friendly and very helpful. The rooms are well appointed, with good storage and the beds are very comfortable. The spa facilities are a great luxury, and will help you to relax and get over jet lag, or soothe your tired feet after a busy day in Paris. The location is prefect for shopping, sightseeing, museums or strolling along the Seine or the Tuileries Gardens. We always look forward to our next stay.
